title: Offering Desktop Backgrounds / Wallpapers!

embed.description: Currently a student as of 2017, I hope to improve my editing skills/artistic sense and create something that i can hold on to for the rest of my life!

body:
Basically what the title says. I'm offering to create a personal background for anyone who'd like one. This is NOT limited to league of legends, it may be other game characters/icons or art types. (note: i don't draw these so i can't create drawings)
If you'd like one created for your personal use contact me here:
https://discord.gg/Gyyaeea
